value: eventgeneric
blackscreentransition
gui_inside
Sir Arron, great to see you! What can I help you with?
I'm good. Just curious how you are doing.
Oh, it's great here! And you visit me regularly too.
In past people didn't seem to like having me around the village, but you seem so relaxed about it.
I'm just a dragon's descendant like you.
What?! REALLY?
Maybe.
Oh... that might be true because you are not afraid of me.
My appearance must be what repulses other people... Do you think I'll be able to find some place where I would be accepted?
Hmmm. True, people want to see something similar to them, rather than different.
Oh... this makes me sad.
But you know what? You might still eventually pass for a human.
Oooh? I can?
Naturally, you have some human characteristics, after all, I'm just not entirely sure how authentic they are.
Uh... Sorry, I don't understand.
I'm saying that I'll need to investigate your body to see if you can pass for a human.
OOOOH, Sir Arron, you can do this for me!?
Well if you request it, it's my job to make sure everyone here is happy.
Okay, please! Let me just untie my apron.
(Darn.. this was way too easy, maybe I should later give her a couple of lessons about dignity)
gui_full
So, how is it?
Hmmm... Let's see.
Arron slowly circles around Ember.
You look rather healthy to me.
I do? Master always said I heal very fast.
He did hit me a lot too, but I didn't feel much, it was kinda funny, ha-ha.
Is that so...
Arron grabbed one of Ember's tits and forcefully rubbed it.
Ah!
Did it hurt?
N-no, it was just so sudden...
I see, softness seems to be rather good.
*Pinch*
Hmm sensitivity seems to be good as well...
(Darn... I might be enjoying it too much)
...Sir Arron?
Oh by the way, You don't really need to add 'Sir' for me.
I don't?.. Ah!
Sorry, was it too rough?
No, it just... feels weird.
Mh-hm, this is a good sign. Very nice...
blackscreenunfade
gui_normal
(Did Master go to Emberâ€™s again? Jeez, he always skips all the boring work...)
blackscreenfade
gui_full
Hey, Ember, have you seen Ar...
(What's even going on? They are doing it right here?)
(...Wow, Ember's are twice as big as mine)
Master, what are you doing?!
What's up? Ember just asked me for help.
(Ember makes move on the Master!? I have never expected that...)
Oh Hey Rose. If you are in no hurry, give us a moment.
Ah... I'm just... Sorry...
Rose quickly shuts the door.
(No way... She never looked mature like that)
Hmm, this is enough I believe.
gui_inside
So how is it?
This seems passable to me. With some time and work you will surely be able to live with humans nicely.
Really!? This makes me so happy. Please, help me in the future too, Sir Arron!
Gladly.
blackscreentransition
